docs.title: Kelas Intensif Kotlin Compose Multiplatform Batch 2
docs.text:
Registration Status: Closed Start at: 14 September 2024 Duration: 2 jam x 12 pertemuan, Sabtu dan Minggu

Daftar Sekarang

Ini adalah kelas intensif Kotlin Multiplatform yang dirancang khusus untuk pengembangan aplikasi Android dan iOS dengan studi kasus. Kursus ini memberikan pemahaman mendalam tentang Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) dan Compose UI, teknologi yang memungkinkan pengembang menulis kode yang dapat berjalan pada platform Android dan iOS. Kita akan mempelajari dasar-dasar Kotlin Multiplatform, termasuk mekanisme cinterop yang memungkinkan integrasi dengan kode native, serta konsep expect/actual yang memisahkan logika platform-agnostik dan platform-spesifik.

Kelas ini menggunakan metode pendekatan studi kasus yang memberikan pengalaman mengembangkan aplikasi secara langsung sambil belajar. Metode ini telah teruji dengan baik oleh intruktur selama bertahun-tahun. Metode ini juga berhasil menyaring peserta dengan minat tinggi dalam studi proyek terkait.

docs.title: Objective material
docs.text:
Material-material ini telah dirancang agar mencangkup semua level dari mulai dasar hingga lanjut.

  • Kotlin Compose Multiplatform dari tingkat basic hingga lanjut
  • Expect dan actual mekanisme
  • Swift dan ObjC interopabilitas
  • Integrasi CocoaPod
  • Event Driven dengan MVI Architecture
  • Networking menggunakan Ktor
  • Manual navigasi dan perbandingan pustaka-pustaka pihak ketiga

docs.title: Kelas yang berlangsung
docs.text: Ada 2 kelas yang berlangsung dalam batch 2 ini:

docs.title: 1. PPOB - Rp200.000
docs.text:
Membuat aplikasi PPOB untuk android dan ios menggunakan Kotlin Compose Multiplatform

Instruktur: Muhammad Utsman

Tanggal:

  • Minggu pertama: 14 September - 15 September 2024
  • Minggu kedua: 21 September - 22 September 2024
  • Minggu ketiga: 28 September - 29 September 2024
  • Minggu keempat: 5 Oktober - 6 Oktober 2024
  • Minggu kelima: 12 Oktober - 13 Oktober 2024
  • Minggu keenam: 19 Oktober - 20 Oktober 2024

Jam: 10.00 - 12.00 / TBD

docs.title: 2. eCommerce - Rp200.000
docs.text:
Membuat aplikasi eCommerce untuk android dan ios menggunakan Kotlin Compose Multiplatform.

Instruktur: Irwan Cannady

Tanggal:

  • Minggu pertama: 14 September - 15 September 2024
  • Minggu kedua: 21 September - 22 September 2024
  • Minggu ketiga: 28 September - 29 September 2024
  • Minggu keempat: 5 Oktober - 6 Oktober 2024
  • Minggu kelima: 12 Oktober - 13 Oktober 2024
  • Minggu keenam: 19 Oktober - 20 Oktober 2024

Jam: 13.00 - 15.00 / TBD

docs.title: Pendaftaran
docs.text:
• Pendaftaran melalui Google Form, kemudian calon peserta akan dikirimi URL Payment paling cepat pada tanggal 5 September 2024.
  • Setelah melakukan pembayaran, peserta akan mendapatkan scheduling calendar dan dimasukan dalam Whatsapp Group kelas terkait.

https://forms.gle/x6BLfPnqQdxwpWr87

docs.title: Contact
docs.text: Email: utsmannn@gmail.com Whatsapp: 0812 8790 3894 - text only (Utsman)

docs.title: Privacy Policy
docs.text: Last Updated: September 9, 2024

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Welcome to Kelas Utsman. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices concerning the collection, use, and protection of data.

docs.title: 1. Information We Do Not Collect
docs.text:
At Kelas Utsman, we prioritize your privacy by not collecting any personal information. This includes, but is not limited to:

  • Personal identification information (such as name, date of birth, or government-issued ID numbers)
  • Contact information (including email addresses, phone numbers, or physical addresses)
  • Financial information (credit card details, bank account information, or any payment-related data)
  • Usage data (IP addresses, browser type, or device information)
  • Cookies or any other tracking technologies
  • Location data
  • Biometric data
  • Social media information

docs.title: 2. Why We Don't Collect Information
docs.text: We believe in providing our services while respecting your right to privacy. By not collecting any personal data, we ensure that your information remains completely private and secure.

docs.title: 3. Use of Information
docs.text:
As we do not collect any personal information, there is no use, processing, or sharing of user data by Kelas Utsman. We do not:

  • Use your data for marketing purposes
  • Share your information with third parties
  • Analyze user behavior or preferences
  • Create user profiles

docs.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
docs.text:
Since we do not collect or store any personal data, there are no data storage or security measures in place for user information. This means:

  • No risk of data breaches affecting your personal information
  • No need for data encryption or protection mechanisms
  • No data retention policies, as we don't retain any data

docs.title: 5. Third-Party Services and Links
docs.text: Kelas Utsman does not use any third-party services that may collect information about you. However, our website or services may contain links to external sites that are not operated by us. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

docs.title: 6. Children's Privacy
docs.text: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 13, also known as "Children" under COPPA (Children's Online Privacy Protection Act). We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers (if we had any, which we don't).

docs.title: 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
docs.text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

docs.title: 8. Your Rights Under Data Protection Laws
docs.text:
As we do not collect any personal data, many typical data protection rights do not apply when using our services. However, you always have the right to:

  • Be informed about how your data is collected and used (which in this case, it isn't)
  • Request information about any personal data we might hold about you (which we don't)
  • Request deletion of any data (which isn't necessary as we don't hold any)

docs.title: 9. International Data Transfers
docs.text: As we do not collect or store any personal information, there are no international data transfers conducted by Kelas Utsman.

docs.title: 10. Legal Basis for Processing Personal Data Under GDPR
docs.text: As we do not collect or process any personal data, we do not rely on any legal basis for data processing under the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation).

docs.title: 11. California Privacy Rights
docs.text: Under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), California residents have specific rights regarding their personal information. However, as Kelas Utsman does not collect any personal information, these rights are not applicable in the context of our services.

docs.title: 12. Contact Us
docs.text:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Kelas Utsman Email: utsmannn@gmail.com

docs.title: 13. Consent
docs.text: By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy. You understand that we do not collect any personal information and therefore cannot use, share, or process any such data.
